body.p:
Lockport Ky May 19th 1864
His Excellency
The Governor of Kentucky
At Frankfort Ky
Haveing Served my Country well near 3 years in the field= and for further, references of my Standing I will refer you to General John Boyle
Haveing this day been called upon by some of my friendes to assist you in raseing 10 000 men which you call for some days Since
I have assented to the call and ask of you authority to commenceing the work immediately as the time is short we have to operate in

Thomas E Bramblet
Governor of Kentucky

Henry
Lockport Ky
May 17th 1864
Razor M
Has been called upon to raise a company of 6 mos men and desires that authority be given him.

L. B. No 3 1864 P 395
Recd A. G. O. May 17th 1864
